name: Projects by Parseh
author: استودیو طراحی پارسه

sections.description:
Projects by Parseh

Display latest projects in page or post with shortcodes

Featured

  • A shortcode to show projects list
  • Widget to show recent projects
  • Filterable projects list ( with Taxonomy )
  • An option page to customize the plugin section

Description

You can create your portfolio’s page and display your projects thanks to the portfolio shortcode,
you can also show your projects as an image gallery selecting the categories that you want to show.
Projects by Parseh works with all wordpress themes.

Idea or Suggestion ?

Send us your feedback and suggestions. projects@parseads.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘projects-by-parseh.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. After extracting , Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place shortcode ‘[projects]’ in your templates
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Add shortcode for display project list
  • Portfolio filter
  • Sidebar widget
  • Initial release
